text: haey knongchamnaom puok areab chonobt anakakhleah chue leu a l laoh ning thngai barlok haey ke chattouk avei delke brichcheak ku daembi banhchit khluon champoh a l laoh ning ttuol kar buongsuong pi anaknoam sar phng der . chaur chreab tha pitabrakd nasa vea chea kar banhchit khluon samreab puokke . a l laoh nung banhchoul puokke tow knong kdei me tda krounea robsa trong . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh mha aphytosa mha anet sraleanh
